apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this poignant emoji showcases two women in a tender embrace, their intertwined hands creating a prominent heart, all bathed in Apple's characteristic soft, realistic lighting. The smooth, rounded forms and vibrant gradients emphasize the warmth and unity of their bond, while the medium-dark and medium-light skin tones reflect inclusivity. It's a powerful symbol of love and partnership, often used to celebrate romantic relationships and deep affection.
